experience.description: Data Scientist and Product Owner at the Artificial Intelligence Team. Developing solutions based on NLP applied to financial data.
responsibilities: Data Exploration and Analysis: responsible for exploring and analyzing large datasets to identify patterns, trends, and relationships. This involves cleaning and preprocessing data, performing statistical analysis, and applying various data mining techniques.

Machine Learning and Predictive Modeling: develop and implement machine learning algorithms and models to make predictions and solve problems. This includes selecting appropriate algorithms, training models, evaluating their performance, and fine-tuning them for optimal results.

Data Visualization: create visual representations of data to effectively communicate insights and findings to stakeholders. They use tools like matplotlib, seaborn, or Tableau to create meaningful and informative visualizations.

Feature Engineering: engineer and transform raw data into meaningful features that can be used by machine learning models. This involves selecting relevant variables, creating new features, and applying techniques like one-hot encoding, scaling, or dimensionality reduction.

Data Pipeline Development: build data pipelines to automate the collection, processing, and analysis of data. This includes integrating data from various sources, ensuring data quality and consistency, and implementing data transformation and aggregation steps.

Collaborating with Stakeholders: work closely with stakeholders, such as business analysts, product owners, and domain experts, to understand their requirements and translate them into data-driven solutions. They communicate findings, insights, and recommendations effectively to non-technical stakeholders.

Continuous Learning and Research: stay updated with the latest advancements in the field of data science and machine learning. They continuously learn new techniques, algorithms, and tools to improve their skills and stay ahead in the rapidly evolving field.
